DescriptionMain: In this step, you can upload MP3s/WAVs for pre-release filtering by either dragging & dropping or clicking to browse files. Tracks can be reordered using drag and drop as well. This section must be completed by clicking on the 'Save & Continue' button below.
DoYouHaveAudio: Do you have audio files to upload?
ModalDes: In order to submit a project for full anti-piracy services including pre-release filtering, you must submit audio files. In the meantime, you can submit track titles and metadata for basic leak detection, monitoring and web-crawling in the next step.
duplicateTrackTitle: You're attempting to enter a duplicate track title / isrc. Click to close.
UploadingFailed: Uploading audio file(s) failed. Please try again. Click to close.
UploadInProgress: Upload in progress. Please do not leave the Guardian until it's complete.
trackSaved: Your track information has been successfully saved.
NoFileFoundFromASPEN: No files found from UMG's ASPEN repository
deleteDisc: Delete the disk & all tracks within it?
